title: Heart Disease Prediction
description: Detect Heart Disease risk in patients using a Logistic Regression ML model developed in Python, to learn from their medical history.

title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Analyze & Identify fraudulent Credit card transactions using Ensemble models & Neural networks in Pytorch. Visualize results using Tableau.

title: Hand-written digits Prediction
description: Identified hand-written digits from image data using K-Means Clustering and Dimensionality Reduction.

title: Auto-pilot Controller Input Prediction
description: Predicted controller inputs for an auto-pilot system using Linear Regression with Polynomial features and Regularization.

title: Survey-Form Web Application
description: Built and deployed a microservices-based survey form application using CI/CD pipeline on AWS EC2.
tools: Tools: Angular, Springboot, Jenkins, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Github

title: React Jobs UI
description: Designed an online Job Portal UI using React JS, JSON Server, and Netlify functions.
tools: Tools: React, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, JSON, Netlify

title: Real Estate Website
description: Designed an impressive and responsive real estate website using React, Vite, and Bootstrap 5.
